titleStmt.title: The life & death of Mr. Joseph Alleine, late teacher of the church at Taunton, in Somersetshire, assistant to Mr. Newton whereunto are annexed diverse Christian letters of his, full of spiritual instructions tending to the promoting of the power of Godliness, both in persons and families, and his funeral sermon, preached by Mr. Newton.
titleStmt.author: Alleine, Theodosia.
Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
Alleine, Joseph, 1634-1668. Christian letters full of spiritual instructions.
Newton, George, 1602-1681. Sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Joseph Alleine.

notesStmt.note: Consists of articles written by Theodosia Alleine and others, with an introd. by Richard Baxter.
"Christian letters full of spiritual instructions" and "A sermon preached at the funeral of Mr. Joseph Alleine" each has special t.p. and separate paging.
Newton's sermon was also issued separately, and appears cataloged separately as Wing (2nd ed.) N1047 at reel .
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Entry for A1013 (The life and death) cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.), replaced by A1011A.
